column4: Just a wall.

column4: Through some aberration of nature, goblins can reach towering heights of two metres or more.
Due to their high susceptibility to magic, goblins in the vicinity of huge magical outflows can become truly gigantic beasts.
A terrifying amalgam of flesh, bone and magical energy. Clearly a failed experiment of a dark wizard, but the magic coursing through it still grants it immense strength.
